description: Number of convex polygons of length 2n on honeycomb, or EG-convex polyominoes.
references: Alain Denise, Christoph Durr and Fouad Ibn-Majdoub-Hassani. Enumeration et generation aleatoire de polyominos convexes en reseau hexagonal (French) [enumeration and random generation of convex polyominoes in the honeycomb lattice]. In Proceedings of 9th Conference on Formal Power Series and Algebraic Combinatorics, pages 222-234, 1997.
A. J. Guttmann and I. G. Enting, The number of convex polygons on the square and honeycomb lattices, J. Phys. A 21 (1988), L467-L474.
Fouad Ibn-Majdoub-Hassani, Combinatoire de polyominos et des tableaux decales oscillants, These de Doctorat, Laboratoire de Recherche en Informatique, Universite Paris-Sud XI, France.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
